arguments.argument:
ping =-1 pingRunning=false cooldown=0 if global.dsmPingFrequency==0 cooldownTime=7 if global.dsmPingFrequency==1 cooldownTime=15 if global.dsmPingFrequency==2 cooldownTime=30 if global.dsmPingFrequency==3 cooldownTime=60 if global.dsmPingFrequency==4 cooldownTime=120
global.ping=ping
pingGraphList=ds_list_create() ds_list_add(pingGraphList,0)
